title: Win-Back Campaign for Dormant Subscriber
description: A subscriber who cancelled their service six months ago is targeted with a special offer to rejoin.

tasks.description: Identify the former subscriber in the marketing database and the specific 'win-back' offer they are eligible for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the user is eligible for a '3 months for the price of 1' offer.

tasks.description: Reactivate the subscriber's account with the special promotional plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reactivates the account and applies the promotion.

tasks.description: Send a confirmation email to the subscriber welcoming them back.
